text: BACK TO POLICIES Supporting text 16.51 Where the policy refers to food and drink uses, these include restaurants, caf√©s, pubs, and other drinking establishments. Hot-food takeaway uses (Sui Generis) are addressed separately within Part 3 of the policy. 16.52 Part 1 recognises that food and drink businesses play an important role in town centres.
